message.name: ERR_ENT_FINDING_XFV_CASE_NOT_REOPENED
message.locale: A finding can only be overridden if an investigation case has been re-opened.

message.name: ERR_ENT_FINDING_XFV_CASE_NOT_OPEN
message.locale: A finding can only be overridden if the case has a status of open or active.

message.name: ERR_ENT_FINDING_MRE
message.locale: Only one finding can be created for an allegation by a user. Additional finding records can be created, but only automatically by the system as a result of the override of the existing finding.

message.name: ERR_ENT_FINDING_XRV_CASE_STATUS_FOR_MODIFY
message.locale: A finding cannot be modified on an investigation that has a status of submitted, approved, or closed.

message.name: ERR_ENT_FINDING_XRV_CASE_STATUS_FOR_OVERRIDE
message.locale: A finding cannot be overridden on a re-opened investigation which has a status of submitted, approved, or closed.

message.name: ERR_ENT_FINDING_XRV_BEFORE_CASE_START
message.locale: Effective date cannot be before case start date - %1d.

message.name: ERR_ENT_FINDING_XRV_CASE_REOPEN_FOR_MODIFY
message.locale: A finding cannot be modified on an investigation that has been reopened.

message.name: ERR_ENT_FINDING_XRV_INSERT_CASE_CANCELLED
message.locale: A finding cannot be added to a cancelled allegation.

message.name: ERR_ENT_FINDING_XRV_MODIFY_CASE_CANCELLED
message.locale: This finding cannot be modified as the allegation is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ENT_FINDING_XRV_OVERRIDE_CASE_CANCELLED
message.locale: This finding cannot be overridden as the allegation is cancelled.
